thread.title: Basketball Player Loses Shoe During Game and Shaq Notices
thread.title_full: Basketball Player Loses Shoe During Game and Shaq Notices

author: dkelly
title: Basketball Player Loses Shoe During Game and Shaq Notices
text:
Comments 
This 19-year-old Drury basketball player has a shoe mishap in the middle of the game and just can't seem to recover. Drury Lady Panther, Lexie Vaught, of Springfield, MO, is sure to be on the team's blooper reel at the end of the season! A video posted by Sports Videos (@houseofhighlights) on Jan 22, 2017 at 8:52pm PST 
What's cooler than some social media fame from falling all over the place? Um, Shaq noticing on social media probably turned Vaught's slip and slide fail into a better week. Shaqtin a fool baby houseofhighlights's video https://t.co/6exuC8NjNs 
Video permission from @OzarksSports Twitter. Topics:
